channel.title: Quality on Mohit Kanwar's App : My Cents
channel.description: Recent content in Quality on Mohit Kanwar's App : My Cents

item.title: Dev Experience
item.description:
I recently came across this article on the GitHub blog that discusses how GitHub’s Developer Experience (DX) team improved innerloop development. While reading the article I was reminded of this quote

Clients do not come first. Employees come first. If you take care of your employees, they will take care of the clients.

â€” Richard Branson1

And as a leader of a development team, I was made to think what am I doing for better experience of my developers, and what can be done better.
